events.title: Mass Meeting #1
events.description: Join us to learn more about MDST and how to become a member.

events.title: Office Hours #1
events.description: Drop by 3302 Mason Hall to ask questions, get help with tutorials, or chat with current members.

events.title: Mass Meeting #2
events.description: Join us to learn about MDST and meet the team in person at the Kuenzel Room in the Union.

events.title: Project Fair
events.description: Meet project leads, explore this semester's projects, and find the right team for you. Room TBA.

events.title: Office Hours #2
events.description: Stop by 2407 Mason Hall for last-minute tutorial help or any questions before the deadline.

events.title: Tutorials Due
events.description: Submit your completed tutorials by this deadline to be eligible for project placement.

events.title: First Work Session
events.description: Kick off the semester with your project team! Meet your teammates and start working together.
